original_text:
Therefore thus says the Lord of hosts concerning the prophets:
“Behold, I will feed them with bitter food
    and give them poisoned water to drink,
for from the prophets of Jerusalem
    ungodliness has gone out into all the land.”
korean_text: 그러므로 만군의 여호와께서 선지자에 대하여 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 보라 내가 그들에게 쑥을 먹이며 독한 물을 마시게 하리니 이는 사악이 예루살렘 선지자들로부터 나와서 온 땅에 퍼짐이라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore thus says the Lord of hosts
I will feed them with bitter food
and give them poisoned water to drink,
for from the prophets of Jerusalem
ungodliness has gone out into all the land.
